meanings.definition: The act of participating in fellowship with others.
meanings.sent1: During the fellowshiping, everyone shared stories and laughter.
meanings.sent2: The church members enjoyed the fellowshiping after the service.
meanings.sent3: The picnic turned into a fellowshiping marathon of games and food.
meanings.sent4: In the world of nature, animals also have their own way of fellowshiping.
meanings.sent5: The warmth and joy of fellowshiping filled the room.

meanings.definition: The state of being in a fellowship.
meanings.sent1: Her happiness showed her love for the fellowshiping.
meanings.sent2: The sense of belonging in the fellowshiping was comforting.
meanings.sent3: The fellowshiping seemed to have its own magical aura.
meanings.sent4: In the fellowshiping of friends, there was a sense of unity.
meanings.sent5: The fellowshiping created a bond that was unbreakable.

meanings.definition: To engage in social activities with others in a friendly and welcoming manner.
meanings.sent1: We look forward to fellowshiping with our neighbors at the block party.
meanings.sent2: The students were fellowshiping happily during the school event.
meanings.sent3: The dogs were fellowshiping in the park, wagging their tails.
meanings.sent4: She found joy in fellowshiping with new colleagues at work.
meanings.sent5: The community was fellowshiping together to support a good cause.
